text: Dervan "Derv" Gordon (born 29 January 1946) is a British singer originally from Jamaica. He was the lead singer for The Equals from 1964 to 2017. He left in 2017 to start performing as a solo artist. He co-wrote many of the Equals' songs with Eddy Grant and Gordon's brother Lincoln Gordon. The bands only song to go to number one in the UK is "Baby, Come Back". == References == Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Black British musicians Category:British singers
title: Derv Gordon
